references.paper_title: Flamingo: a visual language model for few-shot learning
references.reason: This paper introduces Flamingo, a visual language model that is foundational to the research in multimodal large language models and directly relevant to the core topic of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Scannet: Richly-annotated 3d reconstructions of indoor scenes
references.reason: This paper introduces ScanNet, a dataset crucial to creating the benchmark used in the current paper for evaluating visual-spatial intelligence.

references.paper_title: Frames of Mind: The Theory of Multiple Intelligences
references.reason: This foundational book in psychology provides the theoretical framework for understanding visual-spatial intelligence, which is the core focus of the current research.
